vega.uplink.pointing.attitudes

Class Capture

  • java.lang.Object
    • CompositeDataset
      • vega.uplink.pointing.PointingElement
        • vega.uplink.pointing.PointingAttitude
          • vega.uplink.pointing.attitudes.Capture

  • public class Capture
extends PointingAttitude
    A capture pointing is used for calibration purposes. It is required if an attitude that is not exactly known at MTP needs to be flown again at a later time within the same MTP. The capture pointing allows to implement a fixed attitude that was implemented in the same PTR at an earlier time.

    • Field Summary
